Description

Dracma Studios is an independent videogame company based in México. Comprised by a passionate, talented and diverse group of developers with the simple goal of making amazing games and unforgettable experiences.

History

Dracma Studios was founded on August 30th 2019 in the city of Mérida, Yucatán by Héctor Parra and Mario Vallarta. Candle Knight is Dracma Studios' debut title.

Projects

  • Candle Knight
